column1: Little Goat Diner////Their foods often have an Asian twist which I like
column2: and I like how they have a lot of sweet and savory dishes
column3: my personal favorite of the bunch is bull's eye french toast
column4: it's perfectly soft and has strawberries on it. The crab dip is a great comfort food as well
column5: it's not too salty and gets really addicting at first bite. Little Goat's chili is very good as well and its found in various dishes
column6: I'm not a huge fan of chili but it's strong tasting and delicious. I haven't been here for a while
column7: but definitely want to come back to try some of the new dishes on the menu!
